name: supabase-security-with-schemas
description: Some baseline defaults and tools for zone-based least-privilege security when using declarative schemas in Supabase.

scripts.reset: supabase db reset && pnpm run test
scripts.migration: read -p 'What changed? ' change; [ -z "$change" ] && exit 0; supabase db diff -f "$change" && echo 'Now run pnpm db reset.'
scripts.up: supabase migration up && pnpm run test
